About Me

I am a full-stack web developer with exprerience in all layers of software development, including a knowledge of Javascript, HTML, CSS, Vue,js, Nuxt.js, React, Node.js, Python, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and MySQL. I'm passionate about software development, both on the front and back end, and I am always working to learn more. I enjoy projects that push me outside of my comfort zone and knowledge set.
